channel.title: Npc problem
channel.description: ok i have a problem with my npcs with the client im using i see different npcs instead of the normal 1s like king black Drag and black dragons are cats and lessers are like a ghost thing how do i fix this so i can see the real npc

item.title: Npc problem
item.dc:creator: @No-plonkers No-plonkers
item.description:
@No-plonkers wrote:

It depends which client you use. It happens to me, i have a pk rewards shop but it turned out to be a dragon. The thing is the server uses (in most cases) silab ids, but if you use different client, some ids can be different causing you to have mixed up npcs. Hope this helps,

noplonkers

Read full topic

i do use a client but other clients i see the normal npcs how do i fix it so i can see them?
